original_text: Then all the people, both small and great, and the captains of the forces arose and went to Egypt, for they were afraid of the Chaldeans.
korean_text: 노소를 막론하고 백성과 군대 장관들이 다 일어나서 애굽으로 갔으니 이는 갈대아 사람을 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Then all the people, both small and great,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모든 백성이, 곧 작은 자와 큰 자가,

sentences.original_text: and the captains of the forces
for they were afraid of the Chaldeans.
